parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number.  This is not necessarily indicative of a violation, as CMF numbers are associated with candidates, and this post is not directly promoting a candidate.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate by name, surname, or any other identifying information. It focuses on an educational campaign about energy efficiency.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  The content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The target audience is children and their families, indirectly promoting energy efficiency.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote an educational campaign on energy efficiency, not to influence votes in the parliamentary elections. The campaign is run by "România Eficientă" and supported by the Ministry of Energy. There is no mention of any political party or candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post could be considered a form of public relations or citizen journalism, aiming to inform the public about an educational initiative. It provides information about an event and its purpose, without advocating for or against any political candidate or party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express any personal opinions related to the parliamentary elections. It presents factual information about an educational event.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1984903818703736</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes an educational campaign on energy efficiency, organized by "România Eficientă" and supported by the Ministry of Energy.  The content is informative and does not advocate for or against any political candidate or party participating in the parliamentary elections. The post does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  It does not directly refer to a candidate (a), its objective is educational, not electoral (c), and it does not exceed the limits of journalistic information (d). The timing of the post, after the official campaign period, is irrelevant because it is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>EM360</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
